_README: This is a template for creating a Design System config. Copy this file to ./design-systems/[your-ds-name]/design-system.config.json and fill in all values. See design-systems/ibm-carbon/ for a complete example.
name: Your Design System Name
description: Brief description of the DS visual identity: primary color, font, radius philosophy, spacing grid, etc.

colors._comment: Primary and secondary brand palettes. 5 shades each, from lighter to darker. These map to bg-primary-100 through bg-primary-900 in Tailwind.

neutrals._comment: The DS gray scale. 10 steps from lightest (50) to darkest (900). Used for borders, disabled states, text hierarchy, and surfaces.

cssVariables._comment: Shadcn/ui CSS custom properties. Values are HSL without hsl() wrapper: 'H S% L%'. These drive bg-background, text-foreground, bg-card, bg-muted, etc.

semanticColors._comment: Functional/semantic color tokens in hex. Used for interactive states, status indicators, focus rings, links, text hierarchy, and layered surfaces. These become --ds-* CSS custom properties.

semanticColorsDark._comment: Dark mode overrides for semantic colors. Same keys as semanticColors but with dark-mode-appropriate values.

typography._comment: Font families from Google Fonts. googleFontsImport must match the Next.js import name (underscores). weights are the font weights to load. scale defines named type sizes.

scale._comment: Named type sizes. Format: 'sizePx / lineHeightPx / weight N'. These become Tailwind fontSize extensions: text-ds-caption, text-ds-body, text-ds-heading01, etc.
scale.caption: 12px / 16px / weight 400
scale.label: 12px / 16px / weight 600

borderRadius._comment: Border radius scale. Maps to Tailwind's rounded-* classes. Set values that define the DS personality (e.g., all 0px for sharp, or 8px+ for rounded).

shadows._comment: Box shadow scale. Maps to Tailwind's shadow-* classes.

spacing._comment: Spacing system. baseUnit defines the grid (e.g., 8px). scale defines named steps. componentSpacing defines padding/heights for common components.

focus._comment: Focus ring specification. Defines how focused elements look. tailwindPattern is the class string to apply. replacesPattern is the default Shadcn focus pattern that gets replaced.

transitions._comment: Motion/animation tokens. Maps to Tailwind transitionDuration and transitionTimingFunction extensions.

componentOverrides._comment: Per-component Tailwind class overrides applied during DS injection. Two formats: (1) For CVA components: 'base', 'variants', 'sizes' replace the CVA definition strings. (2) For non-CVA components: 'classReplacements' is a find/replace map of class fragments. Components not listed here keep their default Shadcn styling.

button._comment: CVA-based component. Replace base, variant, and size class strings.
button.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap text-sm font-medium transition-colors DS_FOCUS_PATTERN disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:bg-[--ds-disabled] disabled:text-[--ds-disabled-text]

variants.default: border-transparent bg-primary-500 text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary-700 dark:bg-primary-500 dark:hover:bg-primary-700
variants.secondary: border-transparent bg-secondary-500 text-primary-foreground hover:bg-secondary-700 dark:bg-secondary-500 dark:hover:bg-secondary-700

switch._comment: Non-CVA. Use classReplacements for surgical find/replace.

tabs._comment: Structural override. Carbon uses underline tabs, not pill tabs. Provide complete class strings for sub-elements.
tabs.tabsList: inline-flex h-10 items-center justify-start border-b border-[--ds-border-subtle] bg-transparent p-0 text-muted-foreground
tabs.tabsTrigger: inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium transition-all DS_FOCUS_PATTERN disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50 border-b-2 border-transparent data-[state=active]:border-primary-500 data-[state=active]:text-foreground

notes._comment: Free-form notes about the DS philosophy. Helps the agent understand design intent when making decisions not covered by explicit tokens.
notes.borderRadiusPhilosophy: Describe the DS approach to corners (sharp, rounded, mixed).
notes.colorPhilosophy: Describe the DS color personality (warm, cool, neutral, vibrant).
notes.typographyPhilosophy: Describe the DS type approach (weight strategy for headings, body size, spacing).
